title: A Rare Vintage
description: Isabella DaSilva hurtles toward California's wine country in an effort to outrun her past, hoping to lose herself among the vines and make her mark as an intern at a pioneering winery with an impressive reputation. Jonathan Sauvage is at the helm of the struggling winery -- battling demons of his own and unprepared for the arrival of a fiery and opinionated apprentice. Before long, neither one is sure if they are working together or against each other, but one thing is certain: falling in love just might unravel their chances at finding the futures they thought they wanted.
author: Delancey Stewart
